purpose: To provide a structured learning path for individuals interested in AI and large language models using freely available resources
principle: Aggregates and organizes educational content, tutorials, and practical guides for learning AI from scratch
reusability: Can be used as a self-paced learning guide, adaptable for educational curriculums, and as a reference for AI fundamentals
limitations: Primarily focuses on introductory content, may not cover advanced AI topics in depth
name: learn-ai-engineering
description: Learn AI and LLMs from scratch using free resources
highlight: Comprehensive AI and LLM learning resources for beginners using free materials
